definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬戶家庭依然斷水斷電。

sentences.english: Residents of many major urban areas complain of 20-hour-long daily blackouts.
sentences.chinese: 很多大城市的居民抱怨每天斷電時間長達20小時。

sentences.english: With integral manual override, tubing is pinched closed in de-energized state.
sentences.chinese: 隨着積分手動裝置，油管是捏在封閉狀態斷電。

sentences.english: Power loss in the inducer would trigger the deck's playback circuit.
sentences.chinese: 一旦引導器斷電，終端的回放電路就會被觸發。

sentences.english: We haudio-videoe an auxiliary generator in case of power cuts.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一臺萬一斷電時運用的備用發電機。

sentences.english: When changing the inductor, the power must be cut off making the equipment under the state of power off.
sentences.chinese: 更換感應器時，必須切斷電源應使設備處於斷電狀態。

sentences.english: For fare that the electricity will cut off, people storm into convenience store to grab candles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了勉於斷電之苦，人們踊進便利商店搶購蠟燭。

sentences.english: The wires in circuits are kept from heating by either fuses or circuit breakers.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲或斷電器可以保護電路中的電線不致過熱。

sentences.english: It has breakpoint memory and power-off protection function.
sentences.chinese: 斷點記憶和斷電保護功能。

sentences.english: I took candles to the Xinhua bookstore on Zhongshan Rd . so I could look for books when the power failed.
sentences.chinese: 我到中山路的新華書店都自帶蠟燭，以備斷電後使用。

sentences.english: Huge swaths of the capital remained in darkness as a result of widespread power failures.
sentences.chinese: 由於大面積斷電，醫院的大多數地方都漆黑一團。

sentences.english: What happens if my computer suddenly loses power while I am in the middle of playing? Does my donation still count?
sentences.chinese: 如果在玩遊戲時電腦突然斷電，我的捐贈還算數嗎？

sentences.english: When some phase breaks, it can give an alarm with sound and light.
sentences.chinese: 當某相線路斷電時，可進行聲光報警。

sentences.english: Since Mr Yang ignored the order, the school’s water and electricity have been cut off.
sentences.chinese: 因爲楊校長無視政府關停令，該校目前已被斷水斷電。

sentences.english: In addition, the prosthetic hand has the feature of auto power-off to save the energy.
sentences.chinese: 此外並具有自動斷電機制，可達到節能省電之目標。

sentences.english: At least one person was killed in Fukushimaprefecture, north of Tokyowhere four million homes were without power.
sentences.chinese: 福島有1人死亡，東京北部400萬戶家庭斷電。

definition: to have a power failure/power cut
(of a machine) to stop/to shut down/to park a plane/to finish shooting (a TV program etc)/to suspend a phone line/(of a prepaid mobile phone) to be out of credit
out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)
to change one's mind/to go back on one's word
to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
